mapper.select: SELECT * FROM( SELECT sessionNum,c.concertName,ch.hallName,sessionDate,sessionTime,cs.concertNum ,ROW_NUMBER() OVER(partition by sessionDate order by sessionDate) cnt FROM concertSession cs JOIN concert c on cs.concertNum=c.concertNum JOIN concertHall ch ON c.hallNum=ch.hallNum ) WHERE (sessionDate >= TO_DATE(#{startDay}, 'YYYYMMDD') AND sessionDate <= TO_DATE(#{endDay}, 'YYYYMMDD') ) AND cnt=1 ORDER BY sessionDate ASC, concertNum DESC

SELECT concertNum, concertName,genre,ch.hallName ,TO_CHAR(concertStart,'MM-DD') concertStart,TO_CHAR(concertEnd,'MM-DD') concertEnd, TO_CHAR(concertEnd,'MM') endmonth, TO_CHAR(concertStart,'MM') startmonth FROM concert c JOIN concertHall ch ON c.hallNum=ch.hallNum WHERE TO_CHAR(concertEnd,'YYYY') = #{year} ORDER BY concertEnd ASC, ch.hallName ASC
